{"id":500517790,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1622403302,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/500517790/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"47.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isMonotonic(int[] nums) {\n      int monDesc=0;\n      int monAsc=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length-1;i++)\n        {\n            if(nums[i]<=nums[i+1])\n                monAsc++;\n            if(nums[i]>=nums[i+1])\n                monDesc++;\n         }\n        if(monAsc==nums.length-1 || monDesc==nums.length-1)\n             return true;\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array"}
